articles.description: The former model - who narrowly avoided jail after pleading guilty to drink driving last December - today avoided the bankruptcy hearing for a second time after asking the court to postpone it.
articles.content: October 2003: Escaped a speeding charge on a technicality after cops failed to arrest her within 12 weeks. Her Range Rover was allegedly clocked at 70mph in a 40mph zone. Also in October, charges aga… [+7287 chars]
